attributes.action: Change the national uk flag from the union jack to batmans logo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Change the national uk flag from the union jack to batmans logo, Y'know, the yellow bat like he had on his chest in the old TV series with adam west starring as BATMAN!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
